title: Orphrey, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk and gold on linen
Technique: embroidered, "or nue" technique
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Strip composed of two portions of orphrey from chasuble. Five rectangles, each containing a figure - three from back of orphrey and two from front. All done in "or nue" technique.

tombstone.epitaph:
Orphrey, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: silk and gold on linen
Technique: embroidered, "or nue" technique. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt. 1931-4-34-a.
